text: Gravity is the fifth studio album by Canadian rock band Our Lady Peace. It was released on June 18, 2002. The producer of the album was Bob Rock. This album featured new guitarist Steve Mazur who replaced Mike Turner when he left the band in 2001. == Singles from Gravity == *2002 - "Somewhere Out There" *2002 - "Innocent" *2003 - "Made of Steel" Category:2002 albums Category:Our Lady Peace albums
title: Gravity (Our Lady Peace album)
